articles.title: Biden says not to vote for anyone who opposes assault weapons ban, but three vulnerable Dems did just that - Fox News
articles.description: President Biden said at a rally Thursday that Americans should not support candidates who voted against the assault weapons ban — but three vulnerable Democrats did that this summer.
